translation.en: [Idris Elba] We humans love to play.
translation.zh: 我们人类喜欢玩

translation.en: We've been playing since the dawn of our existence.
translation.zh: 我们从存在之初就开始玩

translation.en: Our playgrounds are like mirrors that help us examine ourselves
translation.zh: 我们的游乐场就像镜子 帮助我们检视自己以及周围的世界

translation.en: and the world around us.
translation.zh: 帮助我们检视自己以及周围的世界

translation.en: Playing is the ultimate way to learn about our bodies and our minds.
translation.zh: 玩是了解我们的身体 和思想的终极方式

translation.en: And it's the most dangerous games…
translation.zh: 最危险的游戏

translation.en: …that push us to our limits.
translation.zh: 把我们推向极限

translation.en: Games that are tough, painful, and often deadly
translation.zh: 艰难、痛苦甚至常会致命的游戏

translation.en: help us to explore what we are actually capable of.
translation.zh: 帮助我们探索自己的真正能力

translation.en: Seeking out pain isn't for the faint-hearted.
translation.zh: 寻求痛苦不适合胆小的人

translation.en: Everyone has a personal reason to play these games.
translation.zh: 每个人玩游戏都有自己的理由

translation.en: [Elba] Welcome to the scariest playgrounds of all
translation.zh: 欢迎来到 人类突破痛苦极限的最可怕的游乐场

translation.en: where humans break the pain barrier.
translation.zh: 人类突破痛苦极限的最可怕的游乐场

translation.en: The Sahara Desert, Southern Morocco.
translation.zh: 摩洛哥南部的撒哈拉沙漠

translation.en: The most painful marathon in the world takes place here,
translation.zh: 世界上最痛苦的马拉松在这里举行

translation.en: Marathon des Sables,
translation.zh: Marathon des Sables

translation.en: French for "marathon of the sands."
translation.zh: 这是法语 意为“沙漠马拉松“

translation.en: [Elba] It's a six-day, 156-mile-long ultramarathon,
translation.zh: 这是一场为期六天 长251公里的超级马拉松

translation.en: equal to six regular marathons.
translation.zh: 相当于普通马拉松的六倍

translation.en: [Amy, panting] You got it.
translation.zh: 你行的

translation.en: Just keep going.
translation.zh: 继续坚持

translation.en: [Elba] This is Amy,
translation.zh: 这是艾米

translation.en: and she has a very personal reason for taking part in this dangerous race.
translation.zh: 她参加这危险的比赛 有一个非常私人的原因

translation.en: [Amy] They told me I'd never walk.
translation.zh: 他们说我永远无法行走

translation.en: They told me I'd never run.
translation.zh: 他们说我永远无法跑步

translation.en: [Amy] When I was 19 years old, I was hit by a car on my motorcycle.
translation.zh: 我19岁的时候 骑摩托车被汽车撞倒

translation.en: And the accident crushed my left leg below the knee.
translation.zh: 这场意外毁了我膝部以下的左腿

translation.en: Forty-five surgeries later, my leg was amputated.
translation.zh: 45次手术之后 我的腿被截肢

translation.en: Not many of us get a second chance,
translation.zh: 能得到第二次机会的人不太多

translation.en: but I did.
translation.zh: 但我是其中之一

translation.en: My gift is the ability to endure.
translation.zh: 我的天赋是忍耐

translation.en: I can never get stronger if I don't continue to challenge myself.
translation.zh: 如果我不继续挑战自己 我永远不会变强

translation.en: And that's what led me to the toughest foot race in the world.
translation.zh: 这就是我踏足 世界上最艰难脚力比赛的原因

translation.en: [Elba] Each year, over 1,000 runners participate.
translation.zh: 每年有超过一千名选手参加

translation.en: But last time, only 40 made the finish line.
translation.zh: 但上一次比赛 只有40人冲过终点线

translation.en: [Amy] Growing up, I always wanted to be in the Olympics.
translation.zh: 从小到大 我一直想参加奥运会

translation.en: I always wanted to be a police officer. I always wanted to be in the military.
translation.zh: 我一直想当警察 想参军

translation.en: And that day that that car hit me,
translation.zh: 那天那辆车撞到我

translation.en: washed everything away.
translation.zh: 撞碎了一切

translation.en: It changed me because I look back at what I took for granted.
translation.zh: 这改变了我 因为我回看 自己原本以为理所应当的东西

translation.en: And it brought to the surface the ember that was lying deep within me.
translation.zh: 它令深埋在我体内的余烬浮现

translation.en: And that ember was pain and the ability to endure.
translation.zh: 这余烬是痛苦和忍耐力

translation.en: [Elba] This year, the heat is more extreme than ever,
translation.zh: 今年热浪比以往更猛烈

translation.en: with temperatures reaching up to 133 degrees Fahrenheit.
translation.zh: 温度高达56摄氏度

translation.en: Amy finishes as one of the last today.
translation.zh: 艾米是今天最后一个跑完的

translation.en: -[racer 1] Congrats! -[racer 2] Bravo! You too!
translation.zh: -祝贺啊！ -太棒了！你也是！

translation.en: -[racer 3] Bravo! -[racer 4] Bravo!
translation.zh: -太棒了！ -太棒了！

translation.en: [Elba] But not all runners made it back to the camp.
translation.zh: 但并不是所有运动员都回到了营地

translation.en: [man] Good evening, everyone. Unfortunately, it's very sad news.
translation.zh: 大家晚上好 很不幸 有非常悲伤的消息要宣布

translation.en: Someone died at 5:00 p.m. today from a cardiac arrest.
translation.zh: 今天下午5点有人死于心脏骤停

translation.en: Several people were helping him.
translation.zh: 当时有几个人在帮他

translation.en: Several competitors stopped.
translation.zh: 几位选手停了下来

translation.en: And even doctors. But unfortunately,
translation.zh: 还有几位医生 但很不幸 未能挽救他的生命

translation.en: all these resuscitation efforts were useless.
translation.zh: 但很不幸 未能挽救他的生命

translation.en: And the death was pronounced afterward.
translation.zh: 之后宣布死亡

translation.en: We are all very sad about this situation.
translation.zh: 我们都为这个情况感到非常难过

translation.en: [Amy] I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我很难过

translation.en: [Elba] The tragic news spreads sadness through the camp.
translation.zh: 悲惨的消息传遍了营地

translation.en: But the race continues.
translation.zh: 但比赛仍会继续

translation.en: Each runner has to be self-sufficient,
translation.zh: 每位选手都必须自给自足

translation.en: carrying only a small backpack
translation.zh: 携带一个小背包

translation.en: filled with enough supplies for one week in the desert.
translation.zh: 装入足够在沙漠中维持一周的补给

translation.en: One simple rule dominates the event.
translation.zh: 一个简单的规则支配着这项赛事

translation.en: If the camels catch up with you, you are out of the race.
translation.zh: 如果骆驼追上你 你就被淘汰

translation.en: [Amy] Failure always looms in the background,
translation.zh: 失败总是隐约可见

translation.en: in the back of my mind,
translation.zh: 在我的内心中 总是害怕骆驼会追上我

translation.en: always scared that the camels are gonna pass me because I'm last.
translation.zh: 在我的内心中 总是害怕骆驼会追上我 因为我是最后一个

translation.en: [race official] Set…
translation.zh: 预备

translation.en: [Elba] Amy and her competitors
translation.zh: 艾米和她的竞争对手们

translation.en: put themselves through this grueling experience voluntarily,
translation.zh: 自愿经受这极为痛苦的经历

translation.en: running for days across endless sand dunes
translation.zh: 连日奔跑 穿越无尽的沙丘

translation.en: and the rocky, blistering-hot crust of the earth.
translation.zh: 以及满是岩石的炽热地表

translation.en: This may be a game,
translation.zh: 这是比赛

translation.en: but the danger is very real.
translation.zh: 但危险是真实存在的

translation.en: Many want to prove to themselves
translation.zh: 很多人想证明给自己看

translation.en: that they can face their fears
translation.zh: 自己能面对恐惧

translation.en: and come out alive.
translation.zh: 并活下来

translation.en: [Amy] You're in this giant oven,
translation.zh: 人在这个巨大的烤箱里

translation.en: and there's no way that you can get away from the heat,
translation.zh: 无法逃避酷热

translation.en: just pushing you down into the ground
translation.zh: 热浪将你推到地上

translation.en: and just taking every bit of strength that you have and just sucking it out of you.
translation.zh: 将你所有的力量从你身体中吸走

translation.en: The smell of your burning skin. Your burning feet.
translation.zh: 自己被灼伤的皮肤和脚散发出味道

translation.en: Your skin turning red, not from the sun, but just from the heat of the sand.
translation.zh: 皮肤发红 不是因为阳光 而是因为沙子的热

translation.en: That drowns out the voice inside my head…
translation.zh: 这淹没了我头脑中的声音

translation.en: …that I'm not strong enough,
translation.zh: 让我不会去想自己不够强壮

translation.en: that I'm not good-looking enough,
translation.zh: 不够好看

translation.en: that I'm fat, that I'm whatever.
translation.zh: 很胖 等等

translation.en: And when I get out here in the heat and the pain,
translation.zh: 当我来到这里 在炎热和痛苦中

translation.en: I try and rewrite my story.
translation.zh: 我尝试着重新书写自己的故事

translation.en: My fiercest competition is myself.
translation.zh: 我最凶猛的对手 是我自己

translation.en: I keep cramping. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我老是抽筋

translation.en: -Oh my God, my God! -[man] Do you need help?
translation.zh: -哎呀！ -需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: Oh shit, oh shit, oh shit.
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: [man] We have to push the SOS button. Push the SOS button so they can help us.
translation.zh: 我觉得得按紧急求救按钮 按下紧急求救按钮 让他们来帮我们

translation.en: Push it right there! [cries]
translation.zh: 按这里！

translation.en: [Amy screaming in pain] Somebody help her! Help her!
translation.zh: 谁来帮帮她？帮帮她！

translation.en: -[woman] Put pressure and lift up. -No! [cries in pain]
translation.zh: -按住然后抬起来 -不要！

translation.en: Oh my God! Push it!
translation.zh: 啊！用力按！

translation.en: Oh my God, no, no, no! Push…
translation.zh: 啊！用力按！

translation.en: Please, please, please, push!
translation.zh: 拜托用力按！

translation.en: Please!
translation.zh: 拜托！

translation.en: Okay, sorry.
translation.zh: 好 不好意思

translation.en: -Oh my God, please help me! -[man speaking indistinctly]
translation.zh: 啊！拜托帮帮我！

translation.en: They're so bad.
translation.zh: 好痛啊！

translation.en: Everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都痛

translation.en: Grabbing at my thigh and my thigh here…
translation.zh: 我的大腿很痛 这里很痛！

translation.en: -[woman] Push. -[Amy] Wait.
translation.zh: -用力按 -等等

translation.en: -[woman] Wait. -[Amy] Bend my knee a little, slightly.
translation.zh: -等等 -把我的膝盖稍微弯一下

translation.en: -Oh man. -[man] Okay.
translation.zh: -哎呀！ -好的

translation.en: [Amy] Nobody's gonna understand, and I get that.
translation.zh: 没人会理解 我明白

translation.en: Pain is my playground.
translation.zh: 痛苦是我的游乐场

translation.en: I was screaming like a little girl.
translation.zh: 我刚才尖叫像个小女孩似的

translation.en: [Elba] Amy's pain is a reminder of the obstacle she has overcome.
translation.zh: 艾米的痛苦提醒她必须要克服障碍

translation.en: For her, the Sahara Desert symbolizes the battle with pain
translation.zh: 对她来说 撒哈拉沙漠 象征着她每天与痛苦之间的战斗

translation.en: she faces every day.
translation.zh: 撒哈拉沙漠 象征着她每天与痛苦之间的战斗

translation.en: For thousands of years,
translation.zh: 几千年来

translation.en: humans have been seeking out worthy enemies to play against.
translation.zh: 人类一直在寻找值得与其作战的敌人

translation.en: Roman gladiators drew huge crowds fighting each other and animals.
translation.zh: 罗马角斗士互相打斗 也与动物战斗 吸引了很多人的目光

translation.en: Taking on the wildest opponents to see who comes out alive
translation.zh: 与最狂野的对手对抗 看谁能活下来

translation.en: is something we do to this day.
translation.zh: 是我们今天依然在做的事

translation.en: [Elba] These wild cows are terrifying foes.
translation.zh: 这些野牛是可怕的敌人

translation.en: They are muscular, fast,
translation.zh: 它们肌肉发达 速度快

translation.en: and armed with horns that make light work of human bodies.
translation.zh: 一对牛角对付人的身体简直轻而易举

translation.en: Unless we're armed with a spear,
translation.zh: 除非用矛

translation.en: we don't stand a chance.
translation.zh: 否则我们毫无机会

translation.en: But this isn't bullfighting.
translation.zh: 但这不是斗牛

translation.en: Here in France, challengers like Mathieu,
translation.zh: 在法国 像马蒂厄这样的挑战者进行训练

translation.en: are training to play a deadly game of chicken with these wild beasts.
translation.zh: 像马蒂厄这样的挑战者进行训练 与这些野兽玩一种致命的懦夫游戏

translation.en: The aim, to face the charging cow and come out unscathed.
translation.zh: 目标是面对冲锋而来的牛 保持自己毫发无伤

translation.en: Mathieu runs a cattle farm with his wife Caroline,
translation.zh: 马蒂厄和妻子卡罗琳 经营一家养牛场

translation.en: which gives him plenty of opportunity to size up the competition.
translation.zh: 因此他有充分的观察机会

translation.en: [Mathieu, in French] We go searching for adrenaline you can't find in other sport.
translation.zh: 我们是为了寻找刺激 其他任何运动都无法与其相比

translation.en: We are playing with our lives.
translation.zh: 我们是在拿生命去运动

translation.en: And that is what makes it beautiful.
translation.zh: 这正是这项运动的魅力所在

translation.en: If the move isn't perfect, you are putting yourself in jeopardy.
translation.zh: 如果动作不完美 你就会让自己陷入危险之中

translation.en: So I'll either leave victorious or else end up in the infirmary.
translation.zh: 所以我要不就取胜 要不就进医院

translation.en: [Caroline] It's all good, my girl.
translation.zh: 没事的 姑娘

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: [Elba, in English] Course landaise is a long-standing tradition in the south of Europe.
translation.zh: 朗德斗牛在欧洲南部有着悠久的历史

translation.en: Here, macho men work together to distract the cow
translation.zh: 在这里 充满男子气概的男子精诚合作 分散牛的注意力

translation.en: while one of them gets into position.
translation.zh: 与此同时其中一人就位

translation.en: [Elba] Once there, it's time to play.
translation.zh: 就位之后 游戏就开始了

translation.en: [Elba] All they have to do is stay alive.
translation.zh: 他们只要保住自己的命就行

translation.en: Even with their horns padded,
translation.zh: 就算有角垫

translation.en: the cows are capable of maiming and killing their human opponents.
translation.zh: 牛也有能力让人类对手残废甚至死亡

translation.en: To raise the stakes further,
translation.zh: 为了进一步提高赌注

translation.en: the men wear impeccable outfits.
translation.zh: 男人们穿上盛装

translation.en: Whoever leaves the field looking as dapper as they did when they arrived
translation.zh: 离开场地时 仍能保持来时那么整洁

translation.en: can claim they are the best of the best.
translation.zh: 就是精英中的精英

translation.en: Tonight, the game is extra tough.
translation.zh: 今晚的比赛尤为艰难

translation.en: These young cows are especially strong, fast, and unpredictable.
translation.zh: 这些小牛特别强壮、速度快 且难以预测

translation.en: To come out unscathed would be a miracle.
translation.zh: 想要保持毫发无伤绝非易事

translation.en: [announcer, in French] The cows of tonight are very young
translation.zh: 今晚的牛很年轻

translation.en: and therefore they enter the arena without a rope.
translation.zh: 因此将不栓绳子进入竞技场

translation.en: [Mathieu] When I enter the arena, I come to give it my all.
translation.zh: 进入竞技场时 我会全力以赴

translation.en: I know that it's win or die.
translation.zh: 我知道这是生死之战

translation.en: [Mathieu] Facing these beasts, mistakes are not allowed.
translation.zh: 面对这些野兽 不允许犯错

translation.en: If you are hit by a cow charging at 50 kilometers per hour,
translation.zh: 时速50公里的牛朝你冲来

translation.en: the impact can be fatal.
translation.zh: 撞击可能致命

translation.en: [announcer] Mathieu Noguès!
translation.zh: 马蒂厄·诺盖斯！

translation.en: [Mathieu] We are going to be looking for danger.
translation.zh: 我们寻找危险

translation.en: That's when you realize the importance of life.
translation.zh: 这时你会意识到生命的重要性

translation.en: And to get closer to death somehow.
translation.zh: 以某种方式接近死亡

translation.en: [Elba] Mathieu must face a charging beast for as long as he dares,
translation.zh: 马蒂厄必须 尽可能久地勇敢面对冲来的野兽

translation.en: before leaping aside,
translation.zh: 然后跳开

translation.en: keeping the smallest possible distance between him and the cow.
translation.zh: 尽可能缩小自己与牛之间的距离

translation.en: The closer he comes to death, the more impressive.
translation.zh: 他越接近死亡 表现就越精彩

translation.en: [Mathieu] Fear is human.
translation.zh: 恐惧是人性

translation.en: If we are not scared, that's when it isn't good.
translation.zh: 如果我们不害怕 那就糟糕了

translation.en: As I'm getting older, I admit that I'm becoming more aware of the danger.
translation.zh: 随着年龄的增长 我承认自己的危险意识越来越强

translation.en: And then fear can take over.
translation.zh: 然后恐惧就会占上风

translation.en: [Elba, in English] For Mathieu, it's been a painful night,
translation.zh: 对马蒂厄来说 这是一个痛苦的夜晚

translation.en: but the show must go on.
translation.zh: 但表演必须继续

translation.en: Why he risks his life like this is a mystery to most people.
translation.zh: 他为什么这样拿生命冒险 对大多数人来说是个谜

translation.en: For centuries, this kind of bravery helped us survive.
translation.zh: 千百年来 这种勇敢帮助我们生存

translation.en: But these days, we're more likely to face our death or excruciating pain
translation.zh: 但现在我们更可能 为证明自己的无畏或优势地位

translation.en: to prove our fearlessness or alpha status.
translation.zh: 而面对死亡或极度的痛苦

translation.en: Audiences love a player who is willing to suffer in order to win.
translation.zh: 观众热爱愿意为获胜而受苦的运动员

translation.en: [Elba] But it's not just men who enter the world of pain seeking fame and fortune.
translation.zh: 但进入痛苦世界寻求名利的 不只是男人

translation.en: These days, there are just as many women who want to hit the pain barrier too.
translation.zh: 如今同样也有许多女性 想要突破痛苦极限

translation.en: Here in the north of France,
translation.zh: 在法国北部

translation.en: an insanely dangerous cycle race has existed for almost a century.
translation.zh: 有一项极为危险的自行车比赛 已经存在了将近一个世纪

translation.en: Initially, it was deemed too dangerous for the female of our species.
translation.zh: 最初被认为对女性过于危险

translation.en: [Elba] But now it's time for the women to risk their lives.
translation.zh: 但现在是时候让女人们冒生命危险了

translation.en: This year, the famous Paris-Roubaix cycle race is hosting its first all-female event.
translation.zh: 今年著名的巴黎鲁贝自行车赛 举行首次女子赛

translation.en: This is Ellen van Dijk,
translation.zh: 这是艾伦·范·戴克

translation.en: one of the first women to ever compete.
translation.zh: 率先参加比赛的女性之一

translation.en: Why is this race so dangerous?
translation.zh: 该赛事为何如此危险？

translation.en: It's these ancient cobblestones,
translation.zh: 原因在于这些古老的鹅卵石

translation.en: the bicycle's worst enemy.
translation.zh: 自行车的最大的敌人

translation.en: Welcome to the Hell of the North.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到“北方地狱赛”

translation.en: [Ellen, in Dutch] You can break your ribs pretty easily.
translation.zh: 肋骨很容易骨折

translation.en: That is difficult, but you can still race.
translation.zh: 这很困难 但还是可以比赛

translation.en: People say, "Wow, impressive. She still cycles on with that injury."
translation.zh: 别人会说：“哇！真厉害 她受了伤 还在继续比赛”

translation.en: But if you don't feel a thing, it's not so impressive.
translation.zh: 但如果感觉不到 那就不那么厉害了

translation.en: [Ellen's trainer] You have a high pain barrier.
translation.zh: 你的痛苦极限非常高

translation.en: That time you didn't respond, I was worried.
translation.zh: 那次你没有反应 我很担心

translation.en: If you don't immediately get back on your bike,
translation.zh: 如果不立刻继续骑行

translation.en: then you definitely know something is wrong.
translation.zh: 那肯定知道不对劲了

translation.en: I expect some crashes tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天估计会摔车

translation.en: -You should never give up. -[trainer] No.
translation.zh: 绝对不能放弃

translation.en: [Ellen] Push stoically from start to finish.
translation.zh: 从容不迫 坚持到底

translation.en: Push through!
translation.zh: 坚持到底！

translation.en: [announcer] Today is a tipping point in women's sporting history.
translation.zh: 今天是女子体育史上的转折点

translation.en: The brutal cobbles of the North are faced by 129 women
translation.zh: 北方残酷的鹅卵石将面对129位女性

translation.en: who believe that anything is possible.
translation.zh: 她们相信一切皆有可能

translation.en: It is gonna be a superb race this afternoon.
translation.zh: 今天下午的比赛会非常精彩

translation.en: And just as we go live, the rain has started to fall.
translation.zh: 我们开始直播的时候 雨开始下

translation.en: [Ellen, in Dutch] I'm ignorant. I don't know what's coming.
translation.zh: 我不清楚 我不知道会发生什么

translation.en: I know that there are going to be crashes.
translation.zh: 我知道会出现撞车

translation.en: It's going to be exciting, tough, heroic.
translation.zh: 不过一定会很刺激、很英勇

translation.en: But I can't really imagine it yet.
translation.zh: 但我还无法想象

translation.en: That is where I am nervous for.
translation.zh: 这正是我紧张的方面

translation.en: [Elba, in English] Cycling is a team sport,
translation.zh: 自行车是一项团队运动

translation.en: and everyone has to play a role.
translation.zh: 每个人都要扮演自己的角色

translation.en: Since Ellen is the favorite,
translation.zh: 由于艾伦是大家的最爱

translation.en: the team and the coach will do whatever it takes
translation.zh: 团队和教练会竭尽全力

translation.en: to bring her to the finish line as the winner.
translation.zh: 让她取得胜利

translation.en: If she stays upright, that is.
translation.zh: 不过前提是她不倒下

translation.en: [Ellen, in Dutch] Every woman will fight to be in the exact same spot.
translation.zh: 每一位女骑手都会争取这个位置

translation.en: Riders will overtake you from your left and your right.
translation.zh: 骑手们会从左边和右边超越你

translation.en: There will be a crash here, a flat tire there.
translation.zh: 会撞车 会轮胎没气

translation.en: It will be chaos. Real chaos.
translation.zh: 会很混乱 乱到极点

translation.en: This whole game is not safe at all.
translation.zh: 这比赛根本不安全

translation.en: None of the cyclists will say, "This is not responsible. I quit."
translation.zh: 没有哪个骑手会说 “这太不负责了 我退出”

translation.en: Everyone has the urge to do this.
translation.zh: 大家都充满动力

translation.en: [Elba, in English] It's the suffering that will make these girls heroines today as they race their way north.
translation.zh: 在向北前进的过程中 痛苦将令这些女性成为英雄

translation.en: In a few moments, these women will become one big blur of bodies, mud, and blood.
translation.zh: 一会儿之后 这些女性将乱作一团 到处都是人、泥、血

translation.en: [announcer] …five-star sector is, which is a real turning point in the race.
translation.zh: …五星部分是比赛真正的转折点

translation.en: [Elba] Nobody in the race wants to fall.
translation.zh: 比赛中没人想摔倒

translation.en: None of these cyclists want an injury.
translation.zh: 骑手们谁都不想受伤

translation.en: But in this race,
translation.zh: 但在这场比赛中

translation.en: unfortunately,
translation.zh: 很不幸

translation.en: it's inevitable.
translation.zh: 受伤不可避免

translation.en: [man, in Dutch] Goddammit!
translation.zh: 他妈的！

translation.en: [announcer 2, in English] Here we see more of the first crash. Anna Henderson there.
translation.zh: 这是第一批撞车 安娜·亨德森在那边

translation.en: [man] Yeah, she's up on the bike.
translation.zh: 对 她又上车了

translation.en: [announcer 3] A lot of riders down in that crash.
translation.zh: 这次撞车 许多车手摔倒

translation.en: Ellen van Dijk, the European champion, has also crashed.
translation.zh: 欧洲冠军艾伦·范·戴克也摔倒了

translation.en: [woman] Again, too late.
translation.zh: 我还是要说 太晚了

translation.en: [announcer 3] With 51.7 kilometers to go,
translation.zh: 还有51.7公里

translation.en: one of the race favorites for today's Paris-Roubaix, so Ellen van Dijk on the deck.
translation.zh: 巴黎鲁贝赛最受喜爱的选手之一 艾伦·范·戴克摔倒了

translation.en: [Ellen's trainer] Keep on fighting. You'll make it back.
translation.zh: 继续努力 你会追回来的

translation.en: These girls are riding your back. Come on, girl.
translation.zh: 这些姑娘都在盯着你 加油

translation.en: [announcer 2] You see how slippery it is from when Ellen van Dijk had that problem when she was caught up in the mass crash.
translation.zh: 艾伦·范·戴克在多人撞车中摔倒 由此可见路上有多滑

translation.en: [Ellen, in Dutch] Why hurt yourself voluntarily? No one has to.
translation.zh: 为什么要主动伤害自己？ 没有人必须这样做

translation.en: Breaking boundaries, looking for pain.
translation.zh: 突破界限 寻找痛苦

translation.en: That's when you really feel alive. That life doesn't become a rut.
translation.zh: 这时你才真正觉得自己活着 人生才不会老套无趣

translation.en: Cycling is enduring pain and suffering.
translation.zh: 自行车运动就是忍受与痛苦

translation.en: [announcer 3, in English] Here's Ellen van Dijk. This is the European champion.
translation.zh: 这是艾伦·范·戴克 欧洲冠军

translation.en: [Ellen's trainer] Ellen, you're good because we're behind you.
translation.zh: 艾伦 你表现很好 因为我们在你后面

translation.en: [Ellen, speaking Dutch] As a cyclist, we have a certain function in the team.
translation.zh: 作为自行车手 我们在车队都有特定的功能

translation.en: All the cyclists have to suffer in order to fulfill their function.
translation.zh: 所有车手都要承受痛苦 以实现自己的功能

translation.en: [woman, in English] Your teammates are there to cover your ass.
translation.zh: 你的队友们会掩护你

translation.en: 3.3K to the next sector.
translation.zh: 距离下一部分还有3.3公里

translation.en: [announcer 2] Big crash there for Elisa Longo Borghini.
translation.zh: 艾丽莎·隆戈·博尔吉尼 遭遇重大事故

translation.en: Emma Norsgaard as well just suffering a crash.
translation.zh: 艾玛·诺尔斯加德也撞车了

translation.en: [Elba] As injured racers are pulled out of the way,
translation.zh: 受伤的车手被抬离赛道的时候

translation.en: the cyclists must not get distracted.
translation.zh: 其他车手决不能分心

translation.en: There's no time to be concerned for others.
translation.zh: 没时间担心别人

translation.en: It's the survival of the bravest.
translation.zh: 这是最勇敢者的生存游戏

translation.en: [Ellen, in Dutch] You know you're going to suffer.
translation.zh: 知道自己会承受痛苦

translation.en: But not in which way.
translation.zh: 但不知道以何种方式

translation.en: [woman, in English] Girls, you need to fucking close sector five.
translation.zh: 姑娘们 你们得他妈完成第五部分

translation.en: That is not a question. That is an order.
translation.zh: 这不是问题 是命令

translation.en: You've been too far in the back both sectors, except Audrey.
translation.zh: 除奥黛丽之外 你们在两个部分都太靠后了

translation.en: You need to be up there for Lizzie.
translation.zh: 你们得赶上去帮莉齐

translation.en: First three positions in sector five to go.
translation.zh: 要争取第五部分的前三个位置

translation.en: Come on, girls.
translation.zh: 加油 姑娘们

translation.en: [announcer 2, in Dutch] Look, van Dijk is taking the lead position.
translation.zh: 看 范·戴克在领先位置

translation.en: [woman, in English] Watch the corner.
translation.zh: 小心街角

translation.en: Good job there, girls. Good job. Let's get this done.
translation.zh: 非常好 姑娘们 非常好 我们一定要成功

translation.en: [announcer, in French] Borghini knows what to do, and Ellen van Dijk too.
translation.zh: 博尔吉尼很清楚该怎么做 艾伦·范·戴克也一样

translation.en: [announcer 3, in English] Ellen van Dijk hits the deck. That's a huge crash.
translation.zh: 艾伦·范·戴克也倒地了 大撞车

translation.en: [woman] …just see the bikes tangled up as well.
translation.zh: …看到多辆自行车也纠缠在一起

translation.en: [announcer 3] Big crash of Ellen van Dijk, and they really thumped down then.
translation.zh: 艾伦·范·戴克出现重大撞车 她们撞在了一起

translation.en: She went from-- Oh, Sarah Roy really hit the deck hard.
translation.zh: 莎拉·罗伊摔得很重

translation.en: Ellen van Dijk just lost the wheel on that crown, didn't she, Hannah?
translation.zh: 艾伦·范·戴克在路拱上失控了 对吧 汉娜？

translation.en: We talked a little while earlier about the crown of the road
translation.zh: 我们之前聊过路拱

translation.en: and how critically important it is…
translation.zh: 及其重要性…

translation.en: [announcer 4] This is the most horrible race to ride.
translation.zh: 这是最可怕的比赛

translation.en: It is the most beautiful race to win.
translation.zh: 这是最美的比赛

translation.en: And Lizzie Deignan is heading towards victory.
translation.zh: 莉齐·德尼安正在迈向胜利

translation.en: Deignan reaches the velodrome and goosebumps for the British rider.
translation.zh: 德尼安到达了赛车场 真为这位英国骑手感动

translation.en: This is an incredible and historic day for women's cycling and sport…
translation.zh: 今天是女子自行车比赛 和体育运动的历史性时刻…

translation.en: [Ellen, in Dutch] Is pain really an emotion?
translation.zh: 痛苦是一种情绪吗？

translation.en: Or is it physical?
translation.zh: 还是身体上的？

translation.en: I think pain is subjective.
translation.zh: 我认为痛苦是主观的

translation.en: In the end, you decide your pain limit and how much you can handle.
translation.zh: 最终要由你来决定自己的痛苦极限 决定自己能承受多少痛苦

translation.en: Ooh, Ellen…
translation.zh: 噢 艾伦…

translation.en: [Ellen] Great that Lizzy won, but I had a big crash myself.
translation.zh: 莉齐赢了 太好了 不过我自己也撞得很厉害

translation.en: I got a headache…
translation.zh: 我头都痛了…

translation.en: [Elba, in English] As a professional athlete,
translation.zh: 作为职业运动员

translation.en: Ellen can still be proud she braved the Hell of the North.
translation.zh: 艾伦勇敢地参加了“北方地狱赛” 她依然可以为自己感到骄傲

translation.en: Today, she proved she is among the best in her field.
translation.zh: 今天她证明了 自己是所在领域最优秀的选手之一

translation.en: She persevered, regardless of setbacks.
translation.zh: 即便面临挫折 她仍坚持不懈

translation.en: Undeterred by pain.
translation.zh: 面对痛苦 不屈不挠

translation.en: But facing pain isn't just for the professionals.
translation.zh: 但面对痛苦并不只是专业人士的事

translation.en: You don't need an audience, medals, money, or fame in order to beat it.
translation.zh: 你不需要观众、奖牌、金钱或名气 也依旧可以打败痛苦

translation.en: [Elba] Breaking the pain barrier can also be an incredibly personal journey.
translation.zh: 突破痛苦极限 也可以是一段极为个人的旅程

translation.en: It can be done in complete privacy with only one adversary.
translation.zh: 可以完全不受他人干扰 可以只有一个对手

translation.en: Your inner self.
translation.zh: 内在的自我

translation.en: [Elba] Kiki Bosch doesn't have a team.
translation.zh: 奇奇·博奇没有团队

translation.en: There is no award for winning this game.
translation.zh: 这场比赛没有奖品

translation.en: There is only one thing to beat.
translation.zh: 只要打败一样东西

translation.en: The bitter cold.
translation.zh: 苦寒

translation.en: And there can only be one winner,
translation.zh: 也只可能有一个赢家

translation.en: Kiki herself.
translation.zh: 奇奇自己

translation.en: She dives under the ice in sub-zero temperatures.
translation.zh: 她在零下温度潜入冰层之下

translation.en: [Kiki] The cold has been a big teacher for me.
translation.zh: 寒冷一直是我的良师

translation.en: It's really the diving into the abyss.
translation.zh: 真的是潜入深渊

translation.en: [Kiki] And diving into the most darkest parts of my being
translation.zh: 潜入我生命中最黑暗的地方

translation.en: to eventually dare to turn around and swim back into the light.
translation.zh: 最终敢于回头 游回阳光之下

translation.en: A few years ago, I got sexually assaulted.
translation.zh: 几年前 我被性侵

translation.en: And I really couldn't handle that.
translation.zh: 当时我真的受不了

translation.en: I didn't know if I wanted to face life anymore,
translation.zh: 不知道自己是否还想面对生活

translation.en: and then I heard of this guy named Wim Hof,
translation.zh: 然后我听说有一个叫温霍夫的人

translation.en: and he said, "Yeah, try my method to become happy, healthy, and strong."
translation.zh: 他说：“对 尝试一下我的方法 变得快乐、健康、坚强”

translation.en: And I literally just thought like, "Okay, I give this a shot."
translation.zh: 我当时真的是这么想的：“好 试试看

translation.en: "I can always kill myself tomorrow."
translation.zh: 要自杀的话 明天也来得及”

translation.en: [Elba] On one of her previous dives,
translation.zh: 在之前的一次潜水过程中

translation.en: Kiki fell unconscious and nearly died.
translation.zh: 奇奇失去了意识 差点送命

translation.en: But now she is determined to defy the elements once again.
translation.zh: 但现在她下定决心要再次挑战不可能

translation.en: [Kiki] Every dive,
translation.zh: 每次潜水

translation.en: I really dive further into myself.
translation.zh: 我都会更深入地发现自己

translation.en: And the body just wants to scream.
translation.zh: 身体想要尖叫

translation.en: I surrender the body to the environment.
translation.zh: 我把身体交给周围的环境

translation.en: No matter the pain.
translation.zh: 不管多么痛苦

translation.en: I enter that space…
translation.zh: 我进入这个空间

translation.en: of being okay with all the forces in life that press against us.
translation.zh: 接受生命中一切压迫我们的力量

translation.en: And to then dare to accept all the fears,
translation.zh: 然后敢于接受一切恐惧

translation.en: all the doubts, all the insecurities.
translation.zh: 一切怀疑和不安全感

translation.en: And it doesn't matter if it's ten seconds or a minute.
translation.zh: 不管是十秒还是一分钟

translation.en: Time just stops.
translation.zh: 时间停止了

translation.en: [Elba] She is under for less than a minute.
translation.zh: 她在水下不到一分钟

translation.en: But with every pain receptor in her brain turned up to full volume,
translation.zh: 但她大脑中所有痛苦感受器 都开到最大

translation.en: it seems like an eternity.
translation.zh: 时间长得像永久一般

translation.en: -Okay. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: [Elba] Having been subjected to sub-zero temperatures,
translation.zh: 在零度以下待了许久

translation.en: Kiki needs to get warm as quickly as possible.
translation.zh: 奇奇需要尽快变暖

translation.en: The process is healing, in more ways than one.
translation.zh: 这个过程在很多方面都有治愈的作用

translation.en: [Kiki] It's the shame.
translation.zh: 是耻辱

translation.en: Anger.
translation.zh: 愤怒

translation.en: [Elba] For Kiki, it's about taking control,
translation.zh: 对奇奇来说 重要的是掌控

translation.en: putting her personal trauma behind her.
translation.zh: 将自己的精神创伤放下

translation.en: This is very different from the pain and suffering in her past.
translation.zh: 这与她过去的痛苦截然不同

translation.en: Now she fights the enemy on her own terms.
translation.zh: 现在她按自己设立的规则对抗敌人

translation.en: [Kiki] Physical pain is also linked to emotions.
translation.zh: 身体上的痛苦也与情绪相连

translation.en: It's always more distress leaving the system.
translation.zh: 从体内排出时总会更痛苦

translation.en: That's really how I see it.
translation.zh: 我真的是这么认为

translation.en: When we dare to face our own darkness,
translation.zh: 当我们敢于面对自己的黑暗时

translation.en: that's the only way to get to truly know ourselves
translation.zh: 这是真正了解自己的唯一方法

translation.en: and therefore are open to get to know each other.
translation.zh: 然后才能去互相了解

translation.en: I think when we haven't explored our-- The depths of our own being,
translation.zh: 我认为当我们尚未探索 自己内心深处时

translation.en: we can never truly relate to another person, to another human being.
translation.zh: 就无法真正地对别人感同身受

translation.en: [Elba] In the same ways that scars inflicted by cobblestones or wild beasts can heal,
translation.zh: 鹅卵石或野兽造成的伤疤会愈合

translation.en: so can our mental wounds.
translation.zh: 我们的精神创伤同样也可以

translation.en: Breaking the pain barrier is not for the faint-hearted.
translation.zh: 突破痛苦极限不适合胆小的人

translation.en: The brave souls who do it often suffer for a greater cause.
translation.zh: 能够做到这一点的勇敢灵魂 通常是为了更伟大的目标而承受痛苦

translation.en: In order to truly experience pleasure,
translation.zh: 他们认为 要真正体验快乐

translation.en: they believe you must also experience real pain.
translation.zh: 他们认为 要真正体验快乐 就必须经历真正的痛苦

translation.en: For them, pain is the portal to the meaning of life.
translation.zh: 对他们来说 痛苦是通向生命意义的入口

translation.en: Whatever you choose to believe,
translation.zh: 不论你选择相信什么

translation.en: all wounds eventually heal,
translation.zh: 一切伤口终将愈合

translation.en: and the scars we carry
translation.zh: 我们身上的伤疤

translation.en: will always be a proud reminder of the pain we suffered.
translation.zh: 永远都是对我们曾承受痛苦的提醒

translation.en: After all, what doesn't kill us only makes us stronger.
translation.zh: 反杀不死我的 必使我更强大
